title: BAD IMAGE
body:
Heyllo
I am having trouble with my league client, and I dont know how to fix it. I spent hours looking for solutions but nothing appeared. When i try to launch the client 3 windows pop up named ''BAD IMAGE'' error. Here's what the error says:
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\BugSplat.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc000012f

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\MSVCP140.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc000012f

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\VCRUNTIME140.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc000012f

Alright, now, I dont wanna loose my account, aye'. I spent a lot of money yo, give me my game back

replies.body:
This could be happening for a few reasons, but your account will be totally fine because your info is saved on our servers and not locally.  Firstly, make sure that your Windows is totally up to date so it has necessary products to get you updated.

Then, I suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and performing a clean reinstall to fix up any old game files that might not be updating properly to the updated client.

Finally, you'll want to make sure that your operating system is allowing league to scan your game files and make updates.  This is best down by going over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to add League as an exception.  Hope all that helps!
